title: Camco Rhino 25-Foot RV Clean-Out Gray/Black Water Hose | Features a Heavy-Duty PVC Construction, a Bright Orange Color, and is Great for Cleaning Camper Black Water, Grey Water or Tote Tanks (22990)
description: If you are flushing your RV black and grey water tanks or cleaning out a tote tank, then you have to use a separate hose so that you don’t risk dirtying a drinking water hose. Camco's Rhino 25-Foot grey water hose has a 5/8-inch internal diameter, is made of durable PVC and is bright orange so that you don’t mix it up with your drinking water hoses by accident. The ends are compatible with standard garden hose threads.
